long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LOOP is the ultimate fashion super app, your one-stop destination for all things fashion. From the moment you like it, to the moment you give it a second life, LOOP has you covered.


Curate your dream wardrobe by shopping from over 500 stores, effortlessly adding your favourite items to your personal WISHLIST. Keep an eye on your budget with PRICE ALERTS, ensuring you snag those coveted pieces at the best prices. Looking for second-hand treasures? LOOP scans all major marketplaces simultaneously to find them for you.


Once you’ve made your fashion finds, showcase them in your LOOP Digital Wardrobe and share your style with friends. You can even peek into your friends’ and favourite influencers’ wardrobes for inspiration. Plus, while browsing social and using LOOP Visual recognition tool , you can instantly find similar items.


Finally, when you’re ready to part ways with an item, give it a second life through LOOP by reselling, swapping, fixing, donating, or transforming it into upcycled home decor. It’s truly circular fashion magic!
